1122.content:
Who are we following?

1. Randy, the "Absent-Minded Professor".
Randy doesn't hate the potty-he's actually really into the idea and has had some success. The problem is that he gets so wrapped up in play or watching shows that he forgets his body's 'cues', causing accidents.

2. Felix, the contrarian
Felix goes potty on his time. If he feels like going, he'll go. Otherwise, trying to take him potty is a one-way ticket to Tantrumville. Felix is what they think about when parenting books say "You can't make a child eat, sleep or poop".

3. Dimitri, the "wibbly wobbly" trainer.
Dimitri is partially sold on the idea of the potty, but he sees it as a thing he can do at his leisure. Some days, he's in a 'potty mood' and will be quite the big boy. Other days, it's like he's back in diapers. He needs to see the potty as an all the time thing rather than a sometimes thing.

4. Cole, the caretaker-dependent.
Cole wants to use the potty, but he's not quite in touch with his body's signals, and so, he relies on timers and parental reminders to go potty rather than his own cues. He needs to learn independence.
1122.title: Early Training: Diapers and Pull-Ups, starting ...

11222.content: Felix Kent is your average, ordinary three year old. He's fun loving, excitable, and loves animals. However, in terms of potty training, he's been difficult. He only uses the potty when he feels like it. When he doesn't, well, better hope he's in a Pull-Up or night diaper, or else cleanup will be needed. Where is Felix now?

11223.content:
Dimitri was quite aware of his potty needs and had rather good self-control. When he was first introduced to the potty, he almost immediately adjusted to it with no accidents in his pants at all… for the first two days. The third day, he didn’t make it to the potty even just once.

From then on, it continued to be mixed like that. On some days, Dimitri happily used the potty all by himself, on others he would pee his pants seconds after his mom or dad had asked him if he needed the bathroom. When asked why, Dimitri just shrugged and smiled. It seemed, some days he just didn’t feel like using the potty at all. Putting him in briefs didn’t seem to deter him from treating them like diapers, nor seemed putting him in diapers to not make him use the potty – if he so chose. So for now, he was still in pull-ups for the day and diapers at night.

Our story starts with little Dimitri…

“Alright, buddy,” Dimitri’s dad smiled, glad Dimitri apparently had chosen he wanted to use the potty today. “Just hang on while I get you out of your diaper, ok?” Dimitri obediently sat still to allow his dad to take off his wet night-time diaper. Then dad lifted him off the changing table. “Ok, let’s sit on your potty then-”

“No! Toilet!” bare-bottomed Dimitri screamed, ran outside and made a beeline for the bathroom. Dad followed him. Dimitri had already fetched his little kids toilet seat and carried it over. His dad took it from him and put it on the toilet. Then Dimitri hopped on it. He squinted his eyes at his dad. “Privasy!” he instructed and waved his hand at him dismissively.

Chuckling to himself, dad stepped outside and pulled the door close behind himself – only to be called back inside barely a moment later. Dimitri proudly showed him how much he had peed and dad was appropriately impressed. Together, they flushed the toilet. Then dad helped him wash his hands. 125311.content:
While most kids usualy graduate at the age of 3,4 or 5, Angelina was one of the few exceptions who need a little bit longer.

She dont really mind it to be still here, cause she likes it here, but she is also excited and want to start a real school soon.
Her teachers have told her that, if she is ready, she can directly start in first grade and not, like most Kids from here, in Kindergarten.

Finaly she seems to be on a good way and made some progresses this year. For a few weeks she is in pullups now, only gets a diaper for the naptimes.
If she needs to pee she can go all alone now,, a teacher only checks if she had flushed the toilet and has wasched her hands properly.
For pooping she still needs to call a teacher who helps her wiping but it is her next goal to learn this.

During the lessons and playtime she usualy dont gets checked for accidents anymore, by now her teachers trust her enough that she is able to tell if she didnt made it.


The current schoolyear lasts for 5 more months, and Angelina, her parents and the teachers are all optimistic that she can graduate from the academy.



Now that we know more about Angelinas current state and abbilities, how this will go on?
125311.title: Angelina

1253113.content:
It was just another morning at the Sunny Skies Potty Training Academy.

After her mom had brought her to her grouproom and kissed her goodbye, Angelina went straight to her friend Jennifer to greet her.

Jennifer was one of her oldest friends here and a year younger.
In their potty training they where around the same stage, except for wiping after pooping where Jennifer was a little bit ahead and usualy did it - under observation by a teacher - all by herself.

They both really hoped that next schoolyear they can start first grade together in the same class.

The morning seemed to be very normal. Like usualy for the first 30 minutes the kids could do whatever they want, and there was only one Teacher in the room, Mrs Durnham to look after and to help if someone needs to go potty or was in need a change.

Their second teacher, Miss Berg usually came later to actualy teach the kids some skills based on their individual level.

This morning was a little bit different, when Miss Berg allready entered after 10 Minutes, and she wasnt alone, with her was a girl.
Angelina and Jennifer had never seen this girl before.
They where excited, because this could mean that they would get a new student in class!

That was nothing new for both since they have been here for so long, they always got a few new kids here during the schoolyear.
Most of them where sent back from their old schools when they had to many accidents or they teachers just thought they where not really ready for school or could need a break from lerning stress. Some only stayed for a few weeks and go back to their old class after, others stay longer, till the end of schoolyear or even beyond.

Angelina and Jennifer paused their play and watched how Miss Berg showed the new girl around.


Then Miss Berg called for attention and gathered all kids around to introduce their newest classmember.

She said that her name was Nicole and that she was _ years old
1253113.title: Angelina finds a new friend

choices: She said she had been in 4th grade before but got bullied there
She said she had never been in a school and was only homeschooled
12531132.content:
Angelina was glad and excited about her new classmate.

Till now she was the second oldest at the Academy, but the only one who was older then her was a boy and they didnt talked a lot to each other.

In the past theyve had a few bigger kids here but those usualy only stayed here for a short time and most of them didnt seem very interested in socialicing.

Nicole really looked nice, a little shy and nervous though but Angelina was sure it was only normal for someone who comes to a new place.
She was eager to get to know her better and hoped that Nicole would stay here for longer at least till the end of the schoolyear.

After that introduction, the kids were dismissed to play a little more on their own, that was a good chance for Angelina.
She took Jennifer with her, going straight to the new girl who seemed a little bit lost.
"Hey, I am Angelina, and this is my friend Jennifer, we..ermm just wanted to say hi and welcome! If, youwant to know something or if shall show you arround you..just ask I know this place good"

"Oh..yeah thank you, hehe this is really all very new for me here" Nicole smiled, thoughthere was still a big nervousness in it.

"Dont worry..im sure you will soon fit in here!" Angelina paused "Uhhmm, may i ask you something?"

"Yeah, sure"

"Okay cool..so i wanted to ask, why you came here..and on what school you have been before?"

What was Nicole answer?

choices: Angelina herself after she was done
Nicole and/or Jennifer who heard the hissing sound
Mrs Durnham, who was nearby and heard the hissing
125311321.content:
Nicole needed a few moments to answer, she blushed a bit and it was clearly not easy for her to talk about her past.


Finaly she spoke up: " Well..im from fourth grade but i never really liked it there. We moved here last year and i didnt made any friends in my class...and umm after like 2 weeks i peed my pants in class..i didnt meant to..but it just sometimes happen when im nervous and from that day everyone was calling me a big baby and i got more nervous and i had more accidents..."

"Ohh im so sorry", Angelina said "but here you dont have to be nervous, no one will be mean to you..accidents can happen, and some just need a bit longer to learn, that is okay!"

"Thank you, that is nice, you say that" Nicole smiled

"Are all kids in school allways so mean?" Jennifer asked worried.

"Mhh, no..in my old school they where not like this..okay some giggled if someone had an accident but it has never been that bad. But now i cant go back there its to far..i just hope, that next year when i will start 4th grade again my new classmates will be nicer too."

"We will start in first grade next year" Jennifer said pointed to Angelina and herself

"Oh really?" Nicole raised an eybrow, "Arent you a bit to old for that allready, especially, you?"
She looked at Angelina, who started to blush.
"No its good! most here start in Kindergarten but Mrs Berg says we are smart enough for first grade" Jennifer said in her childish enthusiasm.

Angelina however realised how dumb that soundet, she and Nicole might be in the same situation, but after summerbreak the new girl would be 3 grades ahead, and that made her feel sad.

They talked a bit more, but Angelina was deep in thoughts and barely listening, her mind was so far away she was not even noticing she was peeing her pullup.

Who noticed it first?
